fsrtool.name: fsrtool_ship_skills
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_ship_skills` ( `ship_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `skill_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `corpID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `quantity` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`ship_id`,`skill_id`,`corpID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
